subject: F1 25 game support
description_text:
Hii Simsonn ., 

I purchased recently the f1 2025 game 
My pedals are not working with this game 
I run the software simsonn manager 2.1.0

Is there any option for this game ? 
Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Bart Caethoven,  In our test environment, F1 2025 runs without any issues.  Because the RX axis on our previous handbrake was not disabled, it may cause F1 2025 to fail to bind correctly. You can try fixing this issue using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1: Open the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 software. In the interface, click the “Restore” button. Then click the “Save” button. Reinsert the USB cable. Finally, test to confirm if the RX axis has been successfully disabled. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

Ok i will try later this day

Also what I see is the game don’t show up in the list on the right

Every version off f1 game only the 25 not show up

My asseto corsa competitzione no problem it show up


Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone

Op 16 sep 2025 om 03:14 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:

﻿
Hi Bart Caethoven,

In our test environment, F1 2025 runs without any issues.
Because the RX axis on our previous handbrake was not disabled,
it may cause F1 2025 to fail to bind correctly.
You can try fixing this issue using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1:
Open the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 software.
In the interface, click the “Restore” button.
Then click the “Save” button.
Reinsert the USB cable.
Finally, test to confirm if the RX axis has been successfully disabled.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link%C2%A0>

[https://attachment.freshdesk.com/inline/attachment?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MTU4MDAxODgwMjMyLCJkb21haW4iOiJzaW1zb25uLmZyZXNoZGVzay5jb20iLCJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjo0MjA2MDM2fQ.YZ34UmlrteegbMdZrQV9TbJqXA8Cq_bdyaKnsnRfdTA]

[https://attachment.freshdesk.com/inline/attachment?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MTU4MDAxODgwMjM0LCJkb21haW4iOiJzaW1zb25uLmZyZXNoZGVzay5jb20iLCJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjo0MjA2MDM2fQ.Dmm374Di6jaeLBtxJn6bJViySGC3IReJDDrIWhkPDhY]
Hi Bart Caethoven,  When testing, please take a screenshot of the F1 2025 settings screen so I can compare it and check for any differences from the settings on our computer.

Hii thanks !
It worked like this

Thank a lot for the help guys

Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone
